column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Why have you chosen to involve yourself in the political process ?
#Text=Enough is enough .
#Text=Our current Councillor seems invisible until election time .
#Text=I have seen our ward decline in recent years with graffiti , reduced TTC service , ineffective traffic calming measures and inappropriate development .
#Text=I 've read the platforms of the other candidates , and they are just typical things politicians always say with no actual ideas to back them up .
#Text=I want honesty in government .
#Text=I believe in transparency .
#Text=I believe in backing up every statement with a plan .
#Text=Most of all , I do n't see any vision in the other candidates platforms .
#Text=For example , from Greg Hamara 's web site we see under the heading " Building Safe and healthy neighbourhoods " that his big plan is " Better enforcement of traffic rules " .

column1: #Text=Oh yes , very inspiring plan .
#Text=That just gives me goose bumps .
#Text=Compare that to my idea of Raised Bicycle Lanes as found in Amsterdam , eliminating graffiti as has been done by the New York subway system .
#Text=The other candidates do not place the constituent first .
#Text=Want proof ?
#Text=Check their websites and you 'll see that I am the only one that actually lists and links to the websites of my competitors because I want to HELP constituents make the best choice .
#Text=Why do you want to represent this particular ward on council ?
#Text=Although I have worked in Austin , Texas , San Francisco and other cities , I have lived in Parkdale – High Park for over 35 years and I consider it home .
#Text=I have seen how great the area once was and how great it could be and I am inspired to make it a truly great place to live again .
#Text=How are you currently involved in the community ?
#Text=As a freelance journalist I write about issues that concern the community on many levels .
#Text=I volunteer my time to charity and support local businesses .
#Text=I have lived in the ward for over 35 years and participate in its activities .
#Text=I attend the Arts festival and Ukrainian Festival because not for photo ops as some of the other candidates treat the events , but for the experience itself .
#Text=I do not join a group to just pad my resume or add as a bullet point on campaign literature , I go out and try to effect change .
#Text=For example , I personally sought the Mayor out to discuss my plan for a raised bicycle lane as discussed in http://www.oniszczak.com/index.html#1 .
#Text=I had a vision and I talked to someone that could get things done .
#Text=I saw a need for more community interaction – so I designed and built a website ( vividpicture.com ) that allows all residents to discuss , comment and vote on each others ideas .
#Text=The others list groups they join – but ask yourself – what did this group do for the community lately ?
#Text=Did the candidate actually contribute anything , or did he or she join because it looks good in a list .
